page.title: 19A DAY IN MY LIFE (Cont'd) 2
page.content: Now my thoughts are with Katrina who is being taken for an audition at Oakham School by her grandparents. She hopes to study music there. After lunch my first lesson was to a small group of 16 year olds. I then taught the book "Kes" to a 14 year old group. After school I took Emily to her clarinet lesson. Returned home to prepare a meal of roast beef, Yorkshire pudding, sprouts and potatoes, followed by peach pavolova. Katrina and grandparents returned home, we had a glass of sherry then our meal. Time was away on business but telephoned at 9 pm. The grand- parents left and the children went to bed. Before retiring myself I let the pets into the garden and made sandwiches for tomorrow's lunch and at 10.30 pm retired to bed. {MRS. P. WOOD
